text: "Can You Feel the Love Tonight" is a song written by Elton John and Tim Rice for The Lion King. It won the Best Original Song Award in the 1994 Oscars. ==2019 remake== The song was performed by Donald Glover and Beyoncé in the 2019 remake of The Lion King. title: Can You Feel the Love Tonight
